name: Parsec Postie
description:
A game about being a postie at the edge of the universe. Ride around delivering packages, as the universe accerlates you and causes your body, your bike, the houses and everything to fly out of control.

Inspired by Need 4e+9 speed and Crazy Taxi, Parsec Postie has your delivering things in a universe rife with floating point errors, that cause things to jitter and jump out of control.

Made with @BenTurner for the GMTK2020 Jam - Theme: Out of Control
